Macro Definition Documentation

#define VOIP_CONN_ACTIVE   (4)

both sides have headsets & broadband and are exchanging voice traffic

#define VOIP_CONN_BROADCONN   (2)

is connection broadband?

#define VOIP_CONN_CONNECTED   (1)

VoIP conn status flags (use VoipConnStatus to query)

UDP connection was set up OK

Referenced by VoipGroupConnStatus(), and VoipGroupRemoteUserStatus().

#define VOIP_CONN_STOPPED   (8)

connection attempt stopped

#define VOIP_CONNID_ALL   (-2)

Referenced by VoipConnectionReliableBroadcastOpaque(), VoipConnectionReliableBroadcastUser(), VoipConnectionSend(), VoipConnectionStop(), VoipConnStatus(), and VoipRemoteUserStatus().

#define VOIP_CONNID_NONE   (-1)

special connection identifiers

Referenced by VoipConnectionSend(), VoipConnectionStart(), VoipConnectionStartup(), VoipGroupConnect2(), VoipGroupConnStatus(), VoipGroupDisconnect(), VoipGroupIsMutedByConnId2(), VoipGroupMuteByConnId2(), VoipGroupRemoteUserStatus(), VoipGroupResume2(), VoipGroupStatus(), and VoipGroupSuspend().

#define VOIP_ConnMask (   _iConnID,
  _bEnable 
)    ((_bEnable) << (_iConnID))
#define VOIP_FLAG_INVALID   (0x80000000)

VoIP invalid flag.

Referenced by VoipConnStatus(), VoipGroupConnStatus(), VoipGroupRemoteUserStatus(), and VoipRemoteUserStatus().

#define VOIP_INVALID_SHARED_USER_INDEX   (0xFF)

Invalid shared user index.

#define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_HEADSETOK   (2)

on PC: can only be set when both VOIP_LOCAL_USER_INPUTDEVICEOK and VOIP_LOCAL_USER_OUTPUTDEVICEOK are set

a compatible headset is connected and successfully initialized

#define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_INPUTDEVICEOK   (16)

user selected an input voice device

#define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_MICON   (1)

VoIP local status flags (use VoipLocalUserStatus to query)

microphone is on

#define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_OUTPUTDEVICEOK   (32)

user selected an output voice device

#define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_SENDVOICE   (8)

voice packets being sent

#define VOIP_LOCAL_USER_TALKING   (4)

local user is talking (will be always set for codecs without VAD)

Referenced by VoipConnectionSend(), and VoipConnectionUpdate().

#define VOIP_MAX_CONCURRENT_CHANNEL   (4)

Referenced by VoipCommonResetChannels(), and VoipCommonSelectChannel().

#define VOIP_MAX_LOW_LEVEL_CONNS   (32)

Referenced by VoipHeadsetReceiveVoiceDataCb(), VoipHeadsetRegisterUserCb(), and VoipHeadsetStatus().

#define VOIP_MAXCONNECT   (30)

maximum number of supported connections

Referenced by VoipConnectionStartup(), and VoipHeadsetCreate().

#define VOIP_MAXLOCALCHANNEL   (64)
#define VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS   (1)

maximum number of local users on a single host

Referenced by VoipCommonStartup(), VoipConnectionSend(), VoipConnectionStart(), VoipConnectionUpdate(), VoipHeadsetCreate(), and VoipSetLocalUser().

#define VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS_EXTENDED   (VOIP_MAXLOCALUSERS)

Referenced by VoipCommonApplyChannelConfig(), VoipCommonProcessChannelChange(), VoipConnectionFlush(), VoipConnectionRegisterRemoteTalkers(), VoipConnectionStart(), and VoipHeadsetControl().

Referenced by ConnApiCreate2().

enum VoipProfStatE

VOIP profiling stat enums.

Enumerator
VOIP_PROFSTAT_RECORD 

number of cycles last spent recording data

VOIP_PROFSTAT_COMPRESS 

number of cycles last spent compressing data

VOIP_PROFSTAT_DECOMPRESS 

number of cycles last spent decompressing data

VOIP_PROFSTAT_PLAY 

average number of cycles spent playing data

VOIP_NUMPROFSTATS
